items.sentence: I know your mom doesn\'t want you to talk to me.
I like it spicy, but I don\'t like it too spicy.
I lost my passport. I\'ll have to get a new one.
I\'m not even sure whether Tom will come or not.
It looks like Tom doesn\'t really want this job.
I don\'t mean to poke my nose into your affairs.
The weatherman says there is a storm on the way.
Tom asked me questions I didn\'t want to answer.
I hope neither of them was injured in the crash.
I just lay on the beach and watched people swim.
I just want a little more excitement in my life.
I just want you to make a good first impression.
I can tell you how to avoid the mistakes I made.
Tom shifted the phone receiver to his other ear.
Tom told Mary about what had happened on Monday.
Tom thought Mary wasn\'t being very cooperative.
Tom thought Mary wasn\'t going to pass the exam.
Tom thought that Mary didn\'t understand French.
Tom thought that Mary would be at John\'s party.
Tom has been on TV every night for thirty years.
